value:
$WmMPID_ラクチェ,ch06_20_Luchtaine_F_Normal,Face|Askr is indeed a land in crisis. I see
now that our assistance here is
sorely needed.$k$pWouldn't you agree, Shannan?$k$p$WmMPID_シャナン,ch06_21_Shanan_M_Normal,Face|I would. I believe our strength can
make an important difference here.$k$p$WmMPID_セティ,ch06_22_Seti_M_Normal,Face|It is fortuitous we find ourselves in
Askr all at once. Princess Sharena,
please consider us at your disposal.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I'm so glad to hear that. Thank you!$k$p$WmMPID_アルテナ,ch06_23_Altena_F_Normal,Face|I've heard that Prince Leif has been
aiding you for some time. It would be
an honor to join our efforts to his.$k$p$WmMPID_ラクチェ,ch06_20_Luchtaine_F_Normal,Face|You won't be disappointed! After all,
we've got two divine weapons from
the 12 Crusaders of Jugdral with us.$k$pPrince Shannan wields Balmung,
and Lady Altena, Gáe Bolg. They're
more than a match for any enemy!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Those are some impressive names!
They even SOUND strong.$k$p$WmMPID_アルテナ,ch06_23_Altena_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャナン,ch06_21_Shanan_M_Normal,Face|The weapon does not make the
fighter, Larcei. You know that.$k$pA master swordsman has no reason
to fear a legendary blade in the hands
of a novice.$k$p$WmMPID_ラクチェ,ch06_20_Luchtaine_F_Normal,Face|Don't worry. I've taken your advice to
heart, and I always stay on my toes.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I'm looking forward to seeing both
your skills and your weapons in
action!$k$p
